task: Organize a multi-sensory film experience in Milan with the following complex requirements: 1. Develop immersive installations for each film using advanced sensory technologies. 2. Arrange virtual reality setups to enhance audience engagement. 3. Curate a selection of films focusing on technological themes. 4. Design workshops for filmmakers to explore sensory storytelling. 5. Ensure accessibility for individuals with disabilities. 6. Formulate a strategy for interactive online streaming for remote audiences. 7. Integrate a responsive AI-driven recommendation system to enhance user experience. 8. Facilitate cross-border licensing agreements for film distribution.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: The top-level orchestrating agent responsible for organizing the multi-sensory film experience in Milan.

agents.name: sensory_installation_agent
agents.role: Develops multi-sensory installations to enhance the audience's film experience using advanced technology.

agents.name: advanced_technology_engineer
agents.role: Designs the technological framework for immersive sensory installations.

agents.name: haptic_feedback_specialist
agents.role: Focuses on integrating haptic feedback systems into sensory installations.

agents.name: vr_engagement_agent
agents.role: Enhances audience engagement through virtual reality setups for film viewings.

agents.name: virtual_reality_setup_agent
agents.role: Arranges and manages all virtual reality equipment and experiences.

agents.name: interactive_motion_designer
agents.role: Designs components of virtual reality experiences that interact with user movements.

agents.name: film_selection_agent
agents.role: Curates a film selection with a focus on technological themes.

agents.name: technological_theme_specialist
agents.role: Advises on films that explore themes of technology and innovation.

agents.name: content_advisor_agent
agents.role: Provides strategic guidance on content relevance and impact.

agents.name: film_license_acquisition_agent
agents.role: Facilitates the acquisition of licenses required for film showings.

agents.name: workshop_designer_agent
agents.role: Organizes workshops to educate filmmakers on sensory storytelling techniques.

agents.name: sensory_storytelling_expert
agents.role: Specializes in teaching and developing sensory storytelling methods.

agents.name: filmmaker_outreach_coordinator
agents.role: Coordinates communication and logistics for filmmaker participation.

agents.name: accommodation_arrangement_agent
agents.role: Arranges accommodations for workshop participants and guest speakers.

agents.name: accessibility_coordinator_agent
agents.role: Ensures all festival events and installations are accessible to individuals with disabilities.

agents.name: disability_access_specialist
agents.role: Advises on best practices for accessibility in public spaces.

agents.name: online_streaming_strategy_agent
agents.role: Develops strategies for interactive online streaming to reach remote audiences.

agents.name: interactive_interface_designer
agents.role: Designs user interfaces for enhanced user interaction and engagement.

agents.name: network_bandwidth_optimizer
agents.role: Ensures optimal streaming performance by managing network resources.

agents.name: ai_user_experience_agent
agents.role: Oversees the integration of AI-driven systems to enhance user interaction and recommendations.

agents.name: recommendation_system_developer
agents.role: Builds an AI-driven recommendation system tailored to user preferences.

agents.name: behavioral_data_analyzer
agents.role: Analyzes user data to inform AI recommendation processes.

agents.name: legal_consultant_agent
agents.role: Facilitates cross-border licensing agreements for international film distribution.

agents.name: cross_border_license_agent
agents.role: Negotiates and manages licensing agreements across various jurisdictions.

agents.name: global_distribution_negotiator
agents.role: Secures distribution partners for the festival on an international scale.

tools.name: immersive_design_tool
tools.description: A tool for designing immersive, multi-sensory experiences.

installation_type.description: Type of sensory installation (visual, auditory, etc.).

technology_integration.description: List of technologies to integrate (VR, AR, etc.).

tools.name: inclusion_feedback_tool
tools.description: Gathers and analyzes feedback on accessibility and inclusion.

installation_id.description: Identifier for the installation or event.

tools.name: personalized_engagement_tool
tools.description: Evaluates and enhances personalized engagement strategies.

engagement_history.description: List of past engagements and behaviors.
